title: Cheaters Cheetah
description:
Cheaters Cheetah is a multiplayer FPS game where everyone is given ACTUAL CHEATS for the game. This includes typical wallhacks, aimbot, spinbot and much more. Developed with the help of a former cheat developer (yes, you read that right!), Cheaters Cheetah features a wild array of real-existing cheats. Outsmart and out-cheat your opponents in this one-of-a-kind FPS experience Pub Sim
Unleash your inner cheetah Wallhacks, aimbot, spinbot … you name it! All the cheats you know are free to be used in this arena. But remember, your opponents will also have access to the same cheat. This creates a unique dynamic where everyone knows everyone else’s position, leading to intense mind games and thr i lling battles.
Go legit or rage? Choose your config and dive into the chaos: “ Legit cheat” where everyone only has wallhacks, or the “Rage cheat” where every feature is unlocked!
From the classic deathmatch to a “Raid boss ” mode where multiple legit cheaters team up against 1 rage cheater, Cheaters Cheetah also offers a variety of unique game modes to choose from. The game also features a single player mode, where you can demolish innocent bots as a rage cheater!
BAN those filthy cheetahs with your own hand The game is set in a prison for former cheaters, who were caught using cheats in a popular online FPS. Transformed into cheetahs, they are forced to participate in a game show “Cheaters Cheetah” as a punishment.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.5 GHz or equivalent
